'''Radiant Spincrystal 97''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Where Simurgh Rests]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a crate north of the tree in the [[Hills of Barsom]], [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Sumeru]].
